rimand bharaye pasuwu koti sanwidhanaye deshapalana anshaye nayika thamilini punaruththapana kriyawaliyata sambandhawimata ada adhikaranayedi kamaththa pala karayi.rahas polisiya adhikaranayata warthawak idiripathkaramin ayata erehiwa nadu pawarimata wikalpayak washayen aya punaruththapana kriyawaliye yedawimata nithipathiwaraya nirdesha kara athi bawa adhikaranayata danwa sitiyeya.ema danumdima piligath kolombaa mahesthrathwaraya punaruththapanaya kirima sandaha sakakariya wawuniyawa punthottam kandawura wetha yomukarana lesa niyoga kaleya.wasara thunakata asanna kalayak rimand bharaye pasuwu sakakara thamilini nidahas karaganima wenuwata aya punaruththapanaya sandaha yomu kirimata thiranaya kale ayida yana prashnaya thamilini wenuwen peni siti nithignya manjula pathiraja gen wimasu wita ohu kiya sitiye, ayata erehiwa adhi chodana idiripath nokota punaruththapanayata yomukirimata nithipathiwaraya gena athi thiranayata thamilini ekagathwaya pala kala bawayi.aya samaga sakachcha kirimen anathuruwa me thiranayata elambai bawath ohu prakasha kaleya.2009 mayi 17 da, rajaye aarakshaka ansha wetha bharawu subramaniyam shiwagami nohoth thamilini pasuwa rahas polisiya magin athadanguwata gena rimand bharayata path kerina.
